00011 public class ActionSourceCodeBuilder

00017         public static String build(ActionEntity actionEntity)
00018         {
00019                 actionEntity = (ActionEntity) Orm.selectUnique(actionEntity);
00020 
00021                 String sourceCode = "";
00022 
00023                 String packageName = getPackageName(actionEntity);
00024                 String naturalKeyName = getNaturalKeyValue(actionEntity);
00025                 String systemName = getSystemName(actionEntity);
00026 
00027                 sourceCode += "package modules." + packageName + ".actions;\n";
00028                 sourceCode += "\n";
00029                 sourceCode += "import java.util.Hashtable;\n";
00030                 sourceCode += "import java.util.Vector;\n";
00031                 sourceCode += "import newtonERP.module.AbstractAction;\n";
00032                 sourceCode += "import newtonERP.module.AbstractEntity;\n";
00033                 sourceCode += "import newtonERP.module.AbstractOrmEntity;\n";
00034                 sourceCode += "import newtonERP.orm.Orm;\n";
00035                 sourceCode += "import newtonERP.orm.exceptions.OrmException;\n";
00036                 sourceCode += "import newtonERP.orm.field.Field;\n";
00037                 sourceCode += "import newtonERP.viewers.viewerData.BaseViewerData;\n";
00038                 sourceCode += "import newtonERP.module.generalEntity.StaticTextEntity;\n";
00039 
00040                 sourceCode += "\n";
00041                 sourceCode += "/**\n";
00042                 sourceCode += " * " + naturalKeyName + "\n";
00043                 sourceCode += " * @author NewtonERP code generator - Guillaume Lacasse\n";
00044                 sourceCode += " */\n";
00045                 sourceCode += "public class " + systemName
00046                                 + " extends AbstractAction\n";
00047                 sourceCode += "{\n";
00048                 sourceCode += "    @Override\n";
00049                 sourceCode += "    public AbstractEntity doAction(AbstractEntity sourceEntity, Hashtable<String, String> parameters)\n";
00050                 sourceCode += "    {\n";
00051                 sourceCode += "        return new StaticTextEntity(\"Please implement action\");\n";
00052                 sourceCode += "    }\n";
00053                 sourceCode += "}\n";
00054 
00055                 return sourceCode;
00056         }
00057 
00058         private static String getSystemName(ActionEntity actionEntity)
00059         {
00060                 return actionEntity.getDataString("systemName");
00061         }
00062 
00063         private static String getNaturalKeyValue(ActionEntity actionEntity)
00064 
00065         {
00066                 return actionEntity.getNaturalKeyDescription();
00067         }
00068 
00069         private static String getPackageName(ActionEntity actionEntity)
00070 
00071         {
00072                 return ModuleSourceCodeBuilder
00073                                 .getPackageName(getModuleEntity(actionEntity));
00074         }
00075 
00076         private static ModuleEntity getModuleEntity(ActionEntity actionEntity)
00077 
00078         {
00079                 ModuleEntity moduleEntity = (ModuleEntity) actionEntity
00080                                 .getSingleAccessor(new ModuleEntity().getForeignKeyName());
00081 
00082                 return moduleEntity;
00083         }
